item.text: Now when they approached Jerusalem and came to Bethphage, at the Mount of Olives, Jesus sent two disciples,

<st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2968" class="">village</st> <st data-num="2713" class="">ahead</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2112">Right away</st> you will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> a <st data-num="3688" class="">donkey</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st> there, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>. <st data-num="3089" class="">Untie</st> them and <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> them to <st data-num="1473">me</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="3004">says</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, you are to <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">needs</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them,’</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2117">at once</st>.”
This took place to fulfill what was spoken by the prophet:

“Tell the people of Zion,

‘Look, your king is coming to you,

unassuming and seated on a donkey,

and on a colt, the foal of a donkey.’”
So the disciples went and did as Jesus had instructed them.

They <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> the <st data-num="3688" class="">donkey</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4454" class="">colt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st> their <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1940" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

A<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183">very large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">spread</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloaks</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>. <st data-num="243" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="2875" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="2798" class="">branches</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1186" class="">trees</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">spread</st> them <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>.
The crowds that went ahead of him and those following kept shouting, “Hosanna to the Son of David! Blessed is the one who comes in the name of the Lord! Hosanna in the highest!”

As <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="2579">thrown into an uproar</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>?”
And the crowds were saying, “This is the prophet Jesus, from Nazareth in Galilee.”
Then Jesus entered the temple area and drove out all those who were selling and buying in the temple courts and turned over the tables of the money changers and the chairs of those selling doves.
And he said to them, “It is written, ‘My house will be called a house of prayer,’ but you are turning it into a den of robbers!”

The <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="2297" class="">wonderful</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">things</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> heard the <st data-num="3816" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2896">crying out</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="5614">Hosanna</st> to the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>,” they became <st data-num="23" class="">indignant</st>
and said to him, “Do you hear what they are saying?” Jesus said to them, “Yes. Have you never read, ‘Out of the mouths of children and nursing infants you have prepared praise for yourself’?”
And leaving them, he went out of the city to Bethany and spent the night there.
Now early in the morning, as he returned to the city, he was hungry.

After <st data-num="1492" class="">noticing</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">a</st> <st data-num="4808" class="">fig tree</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="5444" class="">leaves</st>. He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, “<st data-num="3371" class="">Never again</st> will there <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="4808" class="">fig tree</st> <st data-num="3583" class="">withered</st> <st data-num="3916">at once</st>.

When the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> it they were <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> did the <st data-num="4808">fig tree</st> <st data-num="3583" class="">wither</st> <st data-num="3916">so quickly</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1437">if</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">doubt</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> will you <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3588">what</st> was done to the <st data-num="4808">fig tree</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2579">even if</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st>, ‘Be <st data-num="142">lifted up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea,’</st> it will <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>.
And whatever you ask in prayer, if you believe, you will receive.”

Now after Jesus entered the temple courts, the chief priests and elders of the people came up to him as he was teaching and said, “By what authority are you doing these things, and who gave you this authority?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="2504">I</st> will <st data-num="2504" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">question</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">answer</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> then <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="2504" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>.

<st data-num="4159" class="">Where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">did</st> <st data-num="2491">John’s</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> come from? <st data-num="1537" class="">From</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>?”<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="1260" class="">discussed</st> this <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1437">If</st> we <st data-num="2046" class="">say</st>, <st data-num="1537" class="">‘From</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven,’</st> he will <st data-num="2046" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1223">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> did you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him?’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="3004">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="1537">From</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people,’</st> we <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">consider</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="5613">to be</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st>.”
So they answered Jesus, “We don’t know.” Then he said to them, “Neither will I tell you by what authority I am doing these things.
“What do you think? A man had two sons. He went to the first and said, ‘Son, go and work in the vineyard today.’

The boy <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘I <st data-num="2309" class="">will</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not.’</st> <st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5306">later</st> he had a <st data-num="3338">change of heart</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="565" class="">went</st>.

The father<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">went</st> to the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> son and <st data-num="3004">said</st> the <st data-num="5615">same thing</st>. This boy <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘<st data-num="1473">I</st> will, <st data-num="2962">sir</st>,’ <st data-num="2532">but</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="565" class="">go</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Which</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st> his <st data-num="3962">father’s</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>?” They <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “The <st data-num="4413">first</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitutes</st> will <st data-num="4254">go ahead</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!

For John came to you in the way of righteousness, and you did not believe him. But the tax collectors and prostitutes did believe. Although you saw this, you did not later change your minds and believe him.

“Listen to another parable: There was a landowner who planted a vineyard. He put a fence around it, dug a pit for its winepress, and built a watchtower. Then he leased it to tenant farmers and went on a journey.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="2590" class="">harvest</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st> was <st data-num="1448" class="">near</st>, he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> to <st data-num="2983" class="">collect</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> portion of the <st data-num="2590" class="">crop</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>, <st data-num="1194" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="3739">one</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="3739">another</st>, and <st data-num="3036" class="">stoned</st> <st data-num="3739">another</st>.

<st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>, <st data-num="4183">more</st> than the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="4160" class="">treated</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> the <st data-num="5615" class="">same way</st>.

<st data-num="5305" class="">Finally</st> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘They will <st data-num="1788" class="">respect</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son.’</st>

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>, they <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>, ‘<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2818" class="">heir</st>. <st data-num="1205" class="">Come</st>, let’s <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">get</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2817" class="">inheritance!’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="2983" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">threw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1854">out of</st> the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> him.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">owner</st> of the <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> will he <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> to <st data-num="1565" class="">those</st> <st data-num="1092" class="">tenants</st>?”
They said to him, “He will utterly destroy those evil men! Then he will lease the vineyard to other tenants who will give him his portion at the harvest.”

Jesus said to them, “Have you never read in the scriptures:

“‘The stone the builders rejected has become the cornerstone.

This is from the Lord, and it is marvelous in our eyes’?
“For this reason I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit.

The one who <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> will be <st data-num="4917">broken to pieces</st>, and the <st data-num="846">one</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> it <st data-num="4098" class="">falls</st> will be <st data-num="3039" class="">crushed</st>.”<n id="1" />

When<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parables</st>, they <st data-num="1097" class="">realized</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
They wanted to arrest him, but they were afraid of the crowds because the crowds regarded him as a prophet.
